original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

analyzed: dhamma anuloma

original: 3.12. Kilesagocchaka, Kusalattika
analyzed: kilesagocchaka kusalattika

original: 3.12.1. Kilesaduka, Kusalattika
analyzed: kilesa duka kusala ttika

original: Hetu
analyzed: hetu

original: Nokilesaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nokileso kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: no kilesam kusalam dhammam paṭicca no kilesaḥ kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā eka ārammaṇe ekaṃ pe avigate eka saṅkhitta

original: (Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṁ.)
analyzed: sahajāta vāre pi pe pañhā vāre pi sabbattha eka

original: Kilesaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: kilesam akusalam dhammam paṭicca kilesaḥ akusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Nokilesaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nokileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: no kilesam akusalam dhammam paṭicca no kilesaḥ akusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Kilesaṁ akusalañca nokilesaṁ akusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: kilesam akusalañca nokilesam akusalañca dhammam paṭicca kilesaḥ akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe nava sabbattha nava avigate nava

original: Kilesaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchaṁ paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato moho, uddhaccaṁ paṭicca uddhaccasahagato moho.
analyzed: kilesam akusalam dhammam paṭicca kilesaḥ akusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati na hetu paccayā vicikiccham paṭicca vicikicchā sahagataḥ mohaḥ uddhaccam paṭicca uddhacca sahagataḥ mohaḥ

original: Nokilesaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
analyzed: no kilesam akusalam dhammam paṭicca kilesaḥ akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati na hetu paccayā vicikicchā sahagate uddhacca sahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchā sahagataḥ uddhacca sahagataḥ moho

original: Kilesaṁ akusalañca nokilesaṁ akusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: kilesam akusalañca nokilesam akusalañca dhammam paṭicca kilesaḥ akusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati

original: nahetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagate khandhe ca vicikicchañca paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato
analyzed: na hetu paccayā vicikicchā sahagate khandhe ca vicikicchañca paṭicca vicikicchā sahagataḥ

original: moho, uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca uddhaccañca paṭicca uddhaccasahagato moho. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: mohaḥ uddhacca sahagate khandhe ca uddhaccam ca paṭicca uddhacca sahagataḥ mohaḥ

original: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ, sahajātavārādi vitthāretabbo.)
analyzed: na hetuyā tīṇi na adhipatiyā nava na purejāte nava na pacchājāte nava na āsevane nava na kamme tīṇi na vipāke nava na vippayutte nava saṅkhitta sahajāta vāra ādi vitthāretabbaḥ

original: Kileso akusalo dhammo kilesassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: kilesaḥ akusalaḥ dhammaḥ kilesassa akusalassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (majjhe tīṇi sahajātādhipati), anantare
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe nava adhipatiyā nava majjhe tīṇi sahajāta adhipati anantare

original: nava, samanantare nava …pe… upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi,
analyzed: nava samanantare nava pe upanissaye nava āsevane nava kamme tīṇi āhāre tīṇi

original: indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi, magge nava, sampayutte nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: indriye tīṇi jhāne tīṇi magge nava sampayutte nava pe avigate nava

original: Nokilesaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nokileso abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: no kilesam abyākatam dhammam paṭicca no kilesaḥ abyākataḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā eka ārammaṇe ekaṃ pe avigate eka saṅkhitta

original: (Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṁ.)
analyzed: sahajāta vāre pi pe pañhā vāre pi sabbattha eka

analyzed: hetu

original: Saṅkilesikañceva no ca kilesaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saṅkilesiko ceva no ca kileso kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: saṅkilesikam ca iva no ca kilesam kusalam dhammam paṭicca saṅkilesikaḥ ca iva no ca kilesaḥ kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)

original: Kilesañceva saṅkilesikañca akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso ceva saṅkilesiko ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: kilesam ca iva saṅkilesikam ca akusalam dhammam paṭicca kilesaḥ ca iva saṅkilesikaḥ ca akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Saṅkilesikañceva no ca kilesaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saṅkilesiko ceva no ca kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: saṅkilesikam ca iva no ca kilesam akusalam dhammam paṭicca saṅkilesikaḥ ca iva no ca kilesaḥ akusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Kilesañceva saṅkilesikaṁ akusalañca saṅkilesikañceva no ca kilesaṁ akusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso ceva saṅkilesiko ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: kilesam ca iva saṅkilesikam akusalam ca saṅkilesikam ca iva no ca kilesam akusalañca dhammam paṭicca kilesaḥ ca iva saṅkilesikaḥ ca akusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ, kilesadukaakusalasadisaṁ. Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe nava pe avigate nava saṅkhitta kilesa duka akusala sadisa sahajāta vāre pi pe pañhā vāre pi sabbattha vitthāretabba

original: Saṅkilesikañceva no ca kilesaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saṅkilesiko ceva no ca kileso abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: saṅkilesikam ca iva no ca kilesam abyākatam dhammam paṭicca saṅkilesikaḥ ca iva no ca kilesaḥ abyākataḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā eka ārammaṇe ekaṃ pe avigate eka saṅkhitta

original: (Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṁ.)
analyzed: sahajāta vāre pi pe pañhā vāre pi sabbattha eka

original: Kilesavippayuttaṁ saṅkilesikaṁ abyākatañca kilesavippayuttaṁ asaṅkilesikaṁ abyākatañca
analyzed: kilesa vippayuttam saṅkilesikam abyākatam ca kilesa vippayuttam asaṅkilesikam abyākatam ca

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca kilesavippayutto saṅkilesiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca kilesa vippayuttaḥ saṅkilesikaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe āsevane ekam pe avigate pañca

original: Kilesagocchakakusalattikaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ.
analyzed: kilesa gocchaka kusala ttikam niṭṭhita
